snippet.title: Action Roguelike 'Netherworld Covenant' New Content Showcase
snippet.description:
Netherworld Covenant is a dark fantasy-themed, top-down 3D action roguelike game. It is currently available on Steam and will participate in the Steam Next Fest from February 25th to March 4th. The video showcases content still in development and does not represent the final design.  
We welcome everyone to add it to your wishlist and download the demo for a hands-on experience!   #gamedevblog #indiegame
